title: World record-breaking e-bike launched globally
text:
World record-breaking e-bike launched globally 12:44pm EST - 01:34 
An electric bicycle which last October broke the world record for the longest distance covered on a single charge by an e-bike is about to be mass-produced, following a successful crowdfunding campaign. Roselle Chen reports.
